channel.title: Boroughs on MillMint
channel.description: Recent content in Boroughs on MillMint

item.title: Bakur
item.description: a { color: var(--color-indigo); } .markdown a.anchor { color: var(--color-indigo); } The Borough of Bakur : BOROUGH Guide Back to Boroughs ðŸ”” This article is about a borough of Vekllei By the sea, sea, sea, you’ll find a boy, boy, boy, and his heart, heart, heart, remains with his boat, boat, boat. – Memories of the Sea, Tohs Viskaismesn, 1952 B akur is a borough on the far North-West Coast of Vekllei, located in the Afouismeh Region north of Tanger and south of Eyri.

item.title: Bakur
item.description: a { color: var(--color-indigo); } .markdown a.anchor { color: var(--color-indigo); } The Borough of Mumen : BOROUGH Guide Back to Boroughs ðŸ”” This article is about a borough of Vekllei The main beach in Mumen, the nicest of the seaside districts, is constructed out of sand imported from the dunes of Africa. Where the rest of the country has black sand, a symptom of its volcanic turbulence, Mumen has nice yellow sand.

item.title: Holsyim
item.description: a { color: var(--color-indigo); } .markdown a.anchor { color: var(--color-indigo); } The Borough of Holsyim : BOROUGH Guide Back to Boroughs Bea the Bryologist surveys the temperate rainforests of Holsyim ðŸ”” This article is about a borough of Vekllei These are not particularly adventurous expeditions â€” most of her work is performed along old trails and paths, but Bea finds the sublime amidst the mundane and has contributed enormously to the ecological understanding of local flora in the borough of Holsyim, where she was born.

item.title: Lita
item.description: a { color: var(--color-indigo); } .markdown a.anchor { color: var(--color-indigo); } The Borough of Lita : BOROUGH Guide Back to Boroughs Tzipora and Ayn watch a rocket launch at the Lita Cosmodrome ðŸ”” This article is about a borough of Vekllei The Royal Borough of Lita was not far from Copette ( map of Vekllei here), one of the Five Crown Boroughs of Vekllei, but this was Veklleiâ€™s glacial interior and it felt a million miles from anywhere.

item.title: Mirah
item.description: a { color: var(--color-indigo); } .markdown a.anchor { color: var(--color-indigo); } The Borough of Mirah : BOROUGH Guide Back to Boroughs Tzipora and Cobian in the town of Gigayeh, in the Mirah Borough ðŸ”” This article is about a borough of Vekllei Gigayeh had beautiful empty beaches, littered with icebergs that caught the light like jewels, but Tzipora couldnâ€™t swim and the water was freezing.
